trans-unit.source: Create a custom virtual machine running Linux in Azure
trans-unit.target: Create a custom virtual machine running Linux in Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to create a custom virtual machine running Linux in Azure.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to create a custom virtual machine running Linux in Azure.

trans-unit.source: How to Create a Custom Virtual Machine Running Linux in Azure
trans-unit.target: How to Create a Custom Virtual Machine Running Linux in Azure

trans-unit.source: This topic describes how to create a *custom* virtual machine with the Azure CLI using the classic deployment model.
trans-unit.target: This topic describes how to create a *custom* virtual machine with the Azure CLI using the classic deployment model.

trans-unit.source: We will use a Linux image from the available **IMAGES** on Azure.
trans-unit.target: We will use a Linux image from the available **IMAGES** on Azure.

trans-unit.source: The Azure CLI commands give following configuration choices among others:
trans-unit.target: The Azure CLI commands give following configuration choices among others:

trans-unit.source: Connecting the VM to a virtual network
trans-unit.target: Connecting the VM to a virtual network

trans-unit.source: Adding the VM to an existing cloud service
trans-unit.target: Adding the VM to an existing cloud service

trans-unit.source: Adding the VM to an existing storage account
trans-unit.target: Adding the VM to an existing storage account

trans-unit.source: Adding the VM to an availability set or location
trans-unit.target: Adding the VM to an availability set or location

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] If you want your virtual machine to use a virtual network so you can connect to it directly by hostname or set up cross-premises connections, make sure you specify the virtual network when you create the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] If you want your virtual machine to use a virtual network so you can connect to it directly by hostname or set up cross-premises connections, make sure you specify the virtual network when you create the virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: A virtual machine can be configured to join a virtual network only when you create the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: A virtual machine can be configured to join a virtual network only when you create the virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: For details on virtual networks, see [Azure Virtual Network Overview](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=294063).
trans-unit.target: For details on virtual networks, see [Azure Virtual Network Overview](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=294063).
